description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2991/documentation

Photovoltaic installation with a capacity of 3kWp and a life time of 30 years installed in CH.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



All components for the installation of a 3kWp photovoltaic plant, energy use for the mounting, transport of materials and persons to the construction place. Disposal of components after end of life.
category: C:Manufacturing/33:Repair and installation of machinery and equipment/332:Installation of industrial machinery and equipment/3320:Installation of industrial machinery and equipment

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Calculation of amount of panels used based on efficiency data for 2005. Other data are adopted.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Current technology for mounting of panels or laminates, electric installations and other components.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Rough assumption for the decrease in material weights for mounting structures.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Publication for efficiency, mounting systems and own estimations for other components.
